fields.label: Precinct Number
fields.summary: Write your current voting precinct. If unknown, leave blank for COMELEC to fill.

fields.label: Full Name
fields.summary: Print your complete legal name (Last, First, Middle) exactly as on your valid ID.

fields.label: Residence / Address
fields.summary: Provide house number, street, barangay, city/municipality, and province.

fields.label: Sex
fields.summary: Tick Male or Female.

fields.label: Date of Birth
fields.summary: Enter your birthdate in MM/DD/YYYY format.

fields.label: Place of Birth
fields.summary: Write city/municipality and province where you were born.

fields.label: Citizenship
fields.summary: Mark if by Birth, Naturalized, or Reacquired. If not by birth, state date and certificate/order number.

fields.label: Civil Status
fields.summary: Select Single, Married, Widowed, or Legally Separated.

fields.label: Period of Residence
fields.summary: How long you have lived in the city/municipality and in the Philippines (years and months).

fields.label: Profession / Occupation
fields.summary: State your current work or primary source of livelihood.

fields.label: TIN (if any)
fields.summary: Enter your Tax Identification Number if available.

fields.label: Name of Spouse
fields.summary: If married, write the full name of your spouse.

fields.label: Supplemental Data
fields.summary: Tick if you are a Person with Disability (PWD), Indigenous Person (IP), or Illiterate. Attach supplemental data form if needed.

fields.label: Oath of Applicant
fields.summary: Read and affirm that you meet voter qualifications and consent to data processing.

fields.label: Rolled Thumbprints
fields.summary: Affix both thumbprints clearly in the spaces provided.

fields.label: Specimen Signatures
fields.summary: Sign three times above printed name for record validation.

fields.label: Election Officer
fields.summary: For COMELEC use only: signature and details of the officer administering the oath.

fields.label: ERB Decision
fields.summary: Marked Approved or Disapproved, with reason if disapproved.

fields.label: Date of Hearing
fields.summary: Scheduled date for ERB action on your application.

fields.label: Signatures of ERB
fields.summary: Signatures of Chairman and Members of the Election Registration Board.

fields.label: Acknowledgement Receipt
fields.summary: Stub returned to applicant as proof of filing.

fields.label: Application Number & Codes
fields.summary: For official use only: provincial and city/municipal codes, district, and application number.

fields.label: Type of Application
fields.summary: Tick the appropriate: New Registration, Transfer, Change of Name/Correction, Reactivation, or Inclusion/Reinstatement.

fields.label: Transfer of Registration
fields.summary: If moving residence, indicate new address and length of stay.

fields.label: Reactivation of Record
fields.summary: If previously deactivated (e.g., didn’t vote twice, imprisonment, etc.), state reason and attach proof if required.

fields.label: Change of Name / Correction
fields.summary: For marriage or court order. Provide supporting documents (birth certificate, marriage certificate, court order).

fields.label: Inclusion / Reinstatement
fields.summary: Request to include or reinstate name if omitted from the list of voters.

fields.label: Jurat
fields.summary: Applicant’s signature above printed name; sworn before an Election Officer with date and place.
